name: Sheesh by King Julio
description:
Sheeeeesh! King Julio is taking over the App Store.

Let's get the King to his throne and make his game the Numb.1 on the Top Charts.

It's Julio's feeding time! Aim for the worms and shoot Julio to his favourite meal.
Julio has a big appetite and will keep wanting more. Keep up with the King and browse through different obstacles. Bombs, moving worms, bad worms and many others, but nothing can stop him from filling his belly.

Level up and unlock all of the characters:
. Verified Julio
. Valid Julio
. Julionardo Davinci
. Julio Hawk
. And many more...
A surprise awaits you too! You'll be able to play with Julio's Queen, Julia! She's here to feed with her King and rule over their kingdom.

The game is completely FREE to play and you'll be able to enjoy hundreds of levels.

Now can we get a Sheeeeeesh?

Developed by Driple.
www.driple.co
